content: मनस्विन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [प्रशस्तं मनः अस्त्वस्य विनि] {@--1@} Wise, intelligent, clever, highsouled, high-minded; <ls>R. 1. 32</ls>; <ls>Pt. 2. 120.</ls> {@--2@} Attentive. {@--3@} Steadyminded, resolute, determined; <ls>Ku. 5. 6.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} The fabulous animal called Śarabha. --नी {@--1@} A high-minded or proud woman; मनस्विनीमानविघातदक्षं <ls>Ku. 3. 32</ls>; <ls>M. 1. 20</ls>, <ls>V. 3. 5.</ls> {@--2@} A wise or virtuous woman. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of the mother of the moon.
